name: service-home-care
title: #1 Home Care | Medical Service Company (San Diego, CA)
content:
Skip to navigation

Home Care

Non-Medical In-Home Care

San Diego Elderly Care and Home Care in Encinitas, Del Mar, and surrounding areas

Call Now (619) 555-0100

FREE IN-HOME "NEEDS EVALUATION"! Сall us today at (619) 555-0100

Los Angeles Home Care

Non-Medical Home Care

Seniors sometimes require extra assistance with day-to-day activities, and nonmedical home care can offer that help. At-home care allows them to remain comfortable in their own environment, helping seniors age in place for longer. With the flexibility of Home Care, complex medical management plans and lifestyle routines can be catered to the senior’s ideals.

Categories under the umbrella of non-medical home care include companionship services, bathing and dressing support, meal preparation, incontinence management, activities of daily living (ADL), and more! The goal is to provide compassionate lodging where seniors can retain independent lifestyles with reminiscence along with reassurance during retirement age. Enjoy added days of relief knowing there is an entire network dedicated to providing quality home care resources for your relative today.

Our San Diego Home Care includes:

  • Bathing
  • Dressing
  • Incontinence Care
  • Constant Safety Monitoring
  • Meal Preparation
  • Light Housekeeping
  • Errands

Best-In-Class San Diego & Los Angeles Home Care Solutions

Do you qualify for the VA home health aid/homemaker program?
Click Here to learn more.

Home Care

Whether you need a companion or personal care a few times a week or 24 hours a day, let us be your home care solution.

24-Hour Home Care

24-hour home care often makes the most sense for recovering from an illness, those with Alzheimer’s or dementia, or those with limited mobility, providing safety and comfort.

Alzheimer's Home Care

Medical Service Company specializes in providing Alzheimer’s care, dementia care and more in the familiar surroundings and comfort of your elder loved one’s own home.

In-Home Nursing

Our nurses are passionate about providing the highest quality of care. Skilled nursing care compliments our non-medical care services, helping to ensure the highest quality of life.

Comprehensive Care

Our at San Diego home care team offers a wide spectrum of San DiegoHome Care, including hourly caregiver and nursing rates, as well as 24 hour care available at a reduced daily rate.

Senior Companionship

With San Diego home care focused on the lifestyle of our clients, our caregivers enhance the quality of life by escorting our seniors to social functions, dinners, and even on a vacation.

Hospice Support

We offer hospice care in San Diego supplemental to home health and nurse visits. We offer hourly, overnight and 24-hour in home care when 24 hour support is needed.

Post Surgical Care

Our caregivers, certified nurse assistants, certified home health aides, and San Diego home care nurses have superior training to help in the home after a surgical procedure.

9

Hourly, Daily & 24/7 Home Care

9

Alzheimer’s/Dementia Certified

9

Home Safety Evaluation

9

RN Care Management

9

Medication Management

9

Medicare Certified Home Health

Stroke Rehab Care

9

Fall Reduction

Call Now (619) 555-0100
Schedule a Call

Free In-Home

"Needs Evaluation"

 No-Cost, No Obligation "Needs Evaluation"

We are happy to send a specially trained team member to visit you at your home, hospital room or rehabilitation center for a no-cost "Needs Evaluation" to see what kind of care would be best for you or someone you love. This is a no-obligation meeting.

If you decide to hire us for quality home care, the next step is that our Nursing Supervisor performs a thorough evaluation, creates a detailed "person centered" care plan and works with you to make sure all of your care needs are met.

Call Now (619) 555-0100

Medical Service Company

San Diego Home Care



Phone

(619) 555-0100



Email

contact@medicalservicecompany.com

[Skip to navigation](https://medicalservicecompany.com/home-care/#main-content)

# Home Care

## Non-Medical In-Home Care

San Diego Elderly Care and Home Care in Encinitas, Del Mar, and surrounding areas

[Call Now (619) 555-0100](tel:7609657223)

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Personal-care.jpg)

## **FREE IN-HOME "NEEDS EVALUATION"! Сall us today at [(619) 555-0100](tel:7609657223)**

#### Los Angeles Home Care

## Non-Medical Home Care

Seniors sometimes require extra assistance with day-to-day activities, and nonmedical home care can offer that help. At-home care allows them to remain comfortable in their own environment, helping seniors age in place for longer. With the flexibility of Home Care, complex medical management plans and lifestyle routines can be catered to the senior’s ideals.

Categories under the umbrella of non-medical home care include companionship services, bathing and dressing support, meal preparation, incontinence management, activities of daily living (ADL), and more! The goal is to provide compassionate lodging where seniors can retain independent lifestyles with reminiscence along with reassurance during retirement age. Enjoy added days of relief knowing there is an entire network dedicated to providing quality home care resources for your relative today.

_Our San Diego Home Care includes:_

- Bathing
- Dressing
- Incontinence Care
- Constant Safety Monitoring
- Meal Preparation
- Light Housekeeping
- Errands

## Best-In-Class San Diego & Los Angeles Home Care Solutions

[![proudlycaringforveterans horizbadge 300x100 1](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/proudlycaringforveterans-horizbadge-300x100-1.png)](https://medicalservicecompany.com/va-community-support/)

#### **_Do you qualify for the VA home health aid/homemaker program?_** **_[Click Here](https://medicalservicecompany.com/va-community-support/) to learn more._**

![San Diego Respite Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/in-home-care-san-diego.jpeg)

#### Home Care

Whether you need a companion or personal care a few times a week or 24 hours a day, let us be your home care solution.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/san-diego-in-home-care.jpeg)

#### 24-Hour Home Care

24-hour home care often makes the most sense for recovering from an illness, those with Alzheimer’s or dementia, or those with limited mobility, providing safety and comfort.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/home-care-california.jpeg)

#### Alzheimer's Home Care

Medical Service Company specializes in providing Alzheimer’s care, dementia care and more in the familiar surroundings and comfort of your elder loved one’s own home.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/San-Diego-In-Home-Nursing.jpeg)

#### In-Home Nursing

Our nurses are passionate about providing the highest quality of care. Skilled nursing care compliments our non-medical care services, helping to ensure the highest quality of life.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Comprehensive-Care-San-Diego.jpeg)

#### Comprehensive Care

Our at San Diego home care team offers a wide spectrum of San DiegoHome Care, including hourly caregiver and nursing rates, as well as 24 hour care available at a reduced daily rate.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/San-Diego-Senior-Companionship.jpeg)

#### Senior Companionship

With San Diego home care focused on the lifestyle of our clients, our caregivers enhance the quality of life by escorting our seniors to social functions, dinners, and even on a vacation.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/hospice-care-in-San-Diego.jpeg)

#### Hospice Support

We offer hospice care in San Diego supplemental to home health and nurse visits. We offer hourly, overnight and 24-hour in home care when 24 hour support is needed.

![San Diego Home Care](https://medicalservicecompany.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/Depositphotos_30767179_XL-scaled.jpeg)

#### Post Surgical Care

Our caregivers, certified nurse assistants, certified home health aides, and San Diego home care nurses have superior training to help in the home after a surgical procedure.

9

#### Hourly, Daily & 24/7 Home Care

9

9

#### Fall Reduction

[Call Now (619) 555-0100](tel:7609657223)

[Schedule a Call](https://medicalservicecompany.com/home-care/#schedule-a-call)

## Free In-Home

## "Needs Evaluation"

### No-Cost, No Obligation "Needs Evaluation"

We are happy to send a specially trained team member to visit you at your home, hospital room or rehabilitation center for a no-cost "Needs Evaluation" to see what kind of care would be best for you or someone you love. This is a no-obligation meeting.

If you decide to hire us for quality home care, the next step is that our Nursing Supervisor performs a thorough evaluation, creates a detailed "person centered" care plan and works with you to make sure all of your care needs are met.

[Call Now (619) 555-0100](tel:7609657223)

### Medical Service Company

#### San Diego Home Care



#### Phone

(619) 555-0100
